attributes.action: Give Paramedics and ECP's the opportunity to become Independent Prescribers.
attributes.additional_details: It has now reached the time where we need to press the Government for the approval to train and qualify Paramedics and ECP’s as independent Prescribers. The NHS England are a supporter of this practice as well as the further introduction of other Allied Care Professionals to be added to the Independent Prescribers list. We now ask for all your support to lobby parliament with this petition in support of Paramedic and ECP’s being added to the independent Prescribers list.
attributes.background: It has now reached the time where we need to press the Government for the approval to train and qualify Paramedics and ECP’s as Independent Prescribers. For more information please visit our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/locummeds

rejection.details: It looks like you have already made a start on re-submitting your petition.
